backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access control, user profiles, equipment tracking, assignments, issues, session logs, and blob storage with admin/user permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing recent frontend changes tied to App.tsx navigation, auth handling, and reconnect overlay behavior.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style mapping of frontend file paths to concise functional descriptions of screens, hooks, components, and service worker behavior.
frontend/docs/ANDROID_APK_GUIDE.md: Guide explaining how to generate an Android APK from the PWA using PWABuilder and required prerequisites.
frontend/docs/APK_BUILD_INSTRUCTIONS.md: Detailed steps for building an Android APK via PWABuilder or Bubblewrap, including configuration and testing requirements.
frontend/docs/APK_DEPLOYMENT_GUIDE.md: Instructions for deploying and distributing the generated Android APK after PWA readiness checks.
frontend/docs/APK_DOWNLOAD_LINK.md: Short guide describing how to host and share the generated APK, with GitHub Releases as the primary method.
frontend/docs/APK_QUICK_START.md: Fast-start guide for generating the Android APK in minutes using PWABuilder after HTTPS deployment.
frontend/docs/INCIDENT_REPORT.md: Incident report describing credit overuse, deployment failures, scanner issues, and requests for audit and engineering support.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entrypoint setting up PWA metadata, preloading assets, loading ZXing, and registering an autoâ€‘updating service worker.
frontend/index.ts: Contains code to decode image data using a readerRef for QR or barcode processing.
frontend/public/manifest.json: Defines PWA metadata including icons, shortcuts, theme colors, and share targets for Ramp Track.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing versioned caching, update handling, cache cleanup, and network-first navigation with asset bypass rules.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React app handling auth state, hash-based navigation, overlay logic, and conditional rendering of app screens.
frontend/src/components/EquipmentQRScann: React component providing camera-based QR scanning with overlays, torch control, and callbacks for decoded results.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: Error boundary UI that captures runtime errors and provides reload, cache clearing, and optional diagnostics display.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Provides username/password and badge-scan login with validation, error handling, and auth context integration.
frontend/src/components/NotFound.tsx: Renders a styled 404 page with a button to navigate back home.
frontend/src/components/OfflineIndicator: Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/PWAUpdateNotific: Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/ReconnectingOver: Displays a dismissible fullscreen overlay with a spinner while sessions refresh or reconnect.
frontend/src/components/RoleSelectionScr: Shows role options for the authenticated user and provides navigation buttons for agent or admin flows.
frontend/src/components/SignOnScreen.tsx: Presents agent/admin login choices based on user roles and redirects if no user is present.
frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx: Shows a branded splash screen with a loading indicator during app startup.
frontend/src/contexts/AuthContext.tsx: Implements authentication state, session storage hydration, login handling, and refresh logic using React context.
frontend/src/data/gates.ts: Exports a static read-only list of gate coordinate data with IDs, lat/lon, and radius values.
frontend/src/data/userRoster.ts: Defines the UserRosterEntry interface and exports a full hardcoded user roster used for authentication and badge validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to the user's identity, auto-refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.tsx: Empty file placeholder for authentication-related React hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, stored identities, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for equipment, assignment, and issue operations using the backend actor with session validation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes with aviation-focused design.
frontend/src/lib/apiClient.ts: Implements a centralized API request utility with auth token handling, error processing, and profile-missing detection.
frontend/src/lib/auditLog.ts: Manages scan audit events with localStorage, including user lookup, event appending, filtering, and clearing.
frontend/src/lib/autoGateLocator.ts: Determines nearest gate using GPS coordinates with a Haversine distance check and returns a gate label or Out of area.
frontend/src/lib/ensureUserContext.ts: Retrieves user context from localStorage with fallbacks and validates session state without clearing auth on backend failures.
frontend/src/lib/equipmentHistory.ts: Provides an in-memory log of equipment events with functions to add, query, sort, and clear history.
frontend/src/lib/equipmentRegistry.ts: Maintains a localStorage-backed equipment registry with normalization, initialization, and required equipment handling.
frontend/src/lib/parseBadge.ts: Extracts the longest digit sequence from scanner input as a badge ID, returning null if fewer than four digits.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Implements the admin dashboard UI with equipment data, audit logs, filters, and update operations.
frontend/src/pages/CheckInScreen.tsx: UI flow for checking in equipment via QR scan, validating status, capturing GPS, and updating backend logs.
frontend/src/pages/CheckOutScreen.tsx: Handles equipment checkout with QR scanning, availability validation, GPS capture, and assignment creation.
frontend/src/pages/DEBUG_SAFE.tsx: Simple debug screen confirming the app root loads.
frontend/src/pages/EquipmentDetailScreen: Displays equipment details and history with UI for status badges and not-found handling.
frontend/src/pages/ManageEquipmentScreen: Admin tool for listing, searching, adding, and editing equipment records with validation and dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/OperatorHomeScreen.ts: Operator landing page showing user identity and navigation to major actions like take/return equipment.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSetupScreen.ts: Empty placeholder file for profile setup UI.
frontend/src/pages/RampControl.tsx: Empty placeholder for ramp control functionality.
frontend/src/pages/ReportIssueScreen.tsx: React screen for scanning equipment, capturing details, photos, and GPS, and submitting an issue report with equipment updates and activity logs.
frontend/src/pages/SignInScreen.tsx: Login screen handling operator/admin modes, calling AuthContext.login, and managing UI state and errors.
frontend/src/types/zxing.d.ts: Type definitions for ZXing browser-based barcode/QR readers loaded from the global window.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning hash parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata outlining features, architecture, and known issues for Ramp Track.
unknown.bash: Simple build script running pnpm build in the frontend directory.
unknown.txt: Instructions for hosting and installing an Android APK, enabling unknown sources, and granting permissions. Includes demo login, feature list, troubleshooting tips, version info, and support guidance.
